smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

instances.message: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class PreviewActivity is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class ResourceUtil is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class UsageUpdateService is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function onOptionsItemSelected appears to be too complex.
The function getIconIdForCpuUsageDual appears to be too complex.
The function getIconIdForCpuFreq appears to be too complex.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'PreviewActivity' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'UsageUpdateService' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Object 'MyLog' with '17' functions detected. Defined threshold inside objects is set to '11'

smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function makeUsageNotification is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

instances.message: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.name: FunctionMaxLength
smells.description: Function names should not be longer than the maximum set in the project configuration.

instances.message: Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.

smells.name: VariableNaming
smells.description: Variable names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Variable names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: FunctionMinLength
smells.description: Function names should not be shorter than the minimum defined in the configuration.

instances.message: Function names should be at least 3 characters long.

smells.name: SpreadOperator
smells.description: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

instances.message: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

smells.name: UnsafeCallOnNullableType
smells.description: It will throw a NullPointerException at runtime if your nullable value is null.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: findViewById<View>(R.id.freqText1) cannot be safely cast to TextView.
findViewById<View>(R.id.freqImage) cannot be safely cast to ImageView.
coreView.findViewById<View>(R.id.coreImage) cannot be safely cast to ImageView.
coreView.findViewById<View>(R.id.coreText) cannot be safely cast to TextView.
getSystemService(Context.NOTIFICATION_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to NotificationManager.
this.getSystemService(Context.ALARM_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to AlarmManager.
getSystemService(Context.NOTIFICATION_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to NotificationManager.
getSystemService(Context.ALARM_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to AlarmManager.
findViewById<View>(R.id.license_info) cannot be safely cast to TextView.
findViewById<View>(R.id.app_version) cannot be safely cast to TextView.
findViewById<View>(R.id.icon) cannot be safely cast to ImageView.
findViewById<View>(R.id.license_info) cannot be safely cast to TextView.
service.getSystemService(Context.NOTIFICATION_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to NotificationManager.
context.getSystemService(Context.NOTIFICATION_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to NotificationManager.
context.getSystemService(Context.NOTIFICATION_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to NotificationManager.
mServiceRef.get()!!.getSystemService(Context.KEYGUARD_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to KeyguardManager.

smells.description: Restrict the number of return statements in methods.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: ExpressionBodySyntax
smells.description: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

instances.message: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.
Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.
Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class AllCoreFrequencyInfo defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of UsageUpdateService.

smells.name: UnusedPrivateMember
smells.description: Private member is unused.

instances.message: Private property in is unused.
Function parameter error is unused.
Function parameter msg is unused.
